alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:55PM CDT until March 26 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TENSAS...NORTHEASTERN CATAHOULA AND SOUTHERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Enterprise, or 14 miles southwest of Winnsboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Jigger around 700 PM CDT. Wisner around 710 PM CDT. Cooter Point around 720 PM CDT. Newlight around 730 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
